mapper.insert: insert into luck_draw_record (user_id, activity_id, prize_id, luck_draw_time, created_time, updated_time, version) values (#{userId},#{activityId},#{prizeId},#{luckDrawTime},#{createdTime},#{updatedTime},#{version})
mapper.select: select l.id, l.user_id, l.activity_id, l.prize_id, l.luck_draw_time, l.created_time, l.updated_time, l.version, p.prize_type, p.prize_num from luck_draw_record l left join prize p on l.prize_id = p.id where l.user_id = #{userId}
